title: Vlčí kůže
content:
Kůze stažená z vlka.

Vlčí kůže – skinnable item harvested form dead wolves, but they have no alchemical value whatsoever. Geralt does not need the vlk bestiary entry to harvest vlčí kůže from their remains. They can be sold or traded.

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
5  	5  




Lokace
Bažiny
Jeskyně v bažinách
Northwest of the Druidský hájek, not the ones inside the grove, they're tame
East of the Pohřebiště golemů
Bahnice
Břeh
Poznámky
Jean-Pierre wants ten pelts for Zakázka: vlci
Morenn asks for a wolf pelt before agreeing to show Geralt where little dryády come from
Místní léčitelka will buy them
Kalkstein will purchase wolf pelts
Alchymista v Kupecké čtvrti
Sabrina Glevissig buys them in "Cena neutrality"
